column1: O ruler of the universe, Lord God, great deeds are they that thou hast done, *
Thy ways are ways of righteousness and truth, *
O King of all the ages.
Who can fail to do thee homage, Lord, and sing the praises of thy Name? *
For thou only art the Holy One.
All nations will draw near and fall down before thee, *
because thy just and holy works have been revealed.
